content.detailedDescription: I was outside at about 10 o clock and i was looking up at the stars, it was a crystal clear night. i noticed one of the stars getting brighter then dimmer. i went in to get my camera, and i really didn't think i would get any clear photos because i have tried to take photos at night with my camera and nothing ever shows up. well i have photos of exactly what i saw. at one point the orb was as bright of the moon. you can tell in my photos that it definately is not the moon. it had got really bright then went back to the size of a star again then vanished. this is not the first time i have seen weird lights in the sky here. it's the first time that i had my camera though. i have way more photos but there is only enough for three. i will send the rest soon. the weird orb began to move and left weird patterns and streaks.
content.summary: Orbs that would pulse and get bigger and smaller

content.detailedDescription:
my wife and i were driving west on i-10 the morning of nov. 26, 2009. at approx. 2:30 am we were nearing the town of quartzsite, az when i spotted a group of lights several miles to the west and 20 to 30 degrees above the horizon moving eastward towards us at a fairly high speed, and descending. at first i thought it was probably a commercial airliner, it seemed to be at the right altitude for such, and within the normal east-west corridor for flights between phoenix and the l.A./orange county areas. but when i noticed that it seemed to be descending, i watched as closely as i could while driving, then noticed that it seemed to be approaching faster than an airliner could, and growing larger in scale rapidly. it was shaped like a wide triangle, one long edge and two shorter angles, the bottom surface dotted with bright blue/white lights. when it reached a point directly to the south of us at a distance of a couple miles, and 1000' to 2000' agl, it slowed and made a shallow bank towards us to the north. it stopped and hovered about a mile or less to the south of us at or below 1000' agl. we strained our eyes to try to figure out what it was as we passed along the freeway until a hill to the south obscured our view. i noted that we passed a freeway sign "8 miles to quartzsite" during the sighting, so that placed us 8 miles east of quartzsite, westbound on i-10 at approx. 2:30 am nov. 26, 2009. 
 it was a cold, clear desert night, unlit highway, about a quarter moon so billions of stars were visible. we had left mesa az. about 12:30 that morning, and i noticed that orion was visible the entire trip at about 45 degrees above the horizon, moving from east to west in the southern sky as we proceeded toward california. when the object came to rest and we lost sight of it because of the hilly terrain, it was to our view, just below orion. i will never forget that sight! we were excited. the entire sighting lasted around 8 minutes, most of which i concentrated on explaining it away and rationalizing what it may actually be. possibly lights on communication towers we may be approaching, on top of hills, or a hillside mining operation. but when we passed it, i really felt we had witnessed something out of the ordinary. 
 on my return trip two days later (during daylight), i remembered to watch my odometer and at and around 8 miles east of quartzsite i scanned the small foothills to the south and found no signs of radio towers or visible mining operations. i truly believe my wife leonora and i witnessed something special that morning. i have done a few online searches trying to find if anyone else reported seeing this, no luck. i know there were truckers on the road with me that could not have missed it. please, someone tell me you witnessed this too!!!

 thomas caswell
 retired medical imaging engineer
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Very large triangular group of lights moving as 1 towards us and descending.

content.detailedDescription: I went next door to the neighbors house, and we were outside talking about government conspiracy theories, and the female neighbor stopped talking and told me and her other house hold members to look up at the sky. she pointed up at a star-like circle shaped object that was blinking bright white and would fade to where it was not as bright. it was the brightest thing in the sky. my first instinct was that it was a plane. but as we kept watching it, it would only move up a short distance at a time. it has been up in the sky for about an hour now, moving into a diagnal direction. we first noticed it around 8:53 pm. we were debating on calling the cops, but we never did. i have two photos of the object. i came back outside at approximatly 9:40 and the object was still in plane site, but moved a ways from where we had saw it to begin with. i emmediatly called the neighbors back outside and we continued to watch it for about 10-15 minutes. we noticed that the object would flash white, blue, and red colors. i continue to go outside and it is still sitting in the same place as it was the previous time of my neighbors and i witnessing the object. when we first saw the object it would move slowly diagnally, but now it sits in the same place in the sky. it is no longer bright, but now is a red dim color, and looks alot bigger then when we first seen the ufo. in the photos before uploading them onto my computer the object looks like a small white dot. after uploading them i noticed that they are not circular. we have witnessed ufo's in the night sky several times from the neighbors drive way. i am hoping we find answers.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: My neighbors and i saw a ufo in the las vegas night sky

content.detailedDescription: On the corner of rt 590 and finn swamp road a round lack object with a big white light in the center and red lights going around the side. no sound just hovering. was about the size of four two story houses. a four other cars were pulled over looking at it. after about 5 minutes you can hear planes coming from a distance and thats when i drove away.  i have never seen anything like that in my life.
content.summary: Round ufo hovering about 100-300 ft in the air

content.detailedDescription: I was about to go walk my dog and out of the corner of my eye i noticed a bright flash of light. i looked up and seen there were two large balls of light (one larger than the other) and a small red light and within a few seconds flashed and dissapeared. i took my dog outside and further investigated noticing that in the same spot above the tree line there was a dim yellow light that might resemble mars in the night sky as if something had burned out in the sky. shortly after this vanished as well. about an hour after that i noticed these exact same lights in the same location for a split second and they vanished again. i live not more than 30 minutes from dover afb in dover, de. im not sure what to make of it...All i know is that i have never seen anything like that before.
content.summary: 2 large white balls of light, one small red light

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on my couch looking out the window, i saw the a light brighter than lightning, flash across the sky, except it was like an orb. it was some really bright object going way faster than any plane, it was so white that it looked blue. it was around midnight to 1am i dont know the exact time. i noticed the object because it was so bright, i thought it was a meteorite but ive seen two of them so far in my life and this one was way faster than other meteorites i've seen. i see shooting stars a lot, nothing like that, i see planes here all the time, nothing like that. it went from the sky downwards straight down, not across the sky from east to west. it looked like it went pass the earth and satellites. i see the iss pass in the sky and other satellites, it was nothing like i have ever seen. i'm glad i witnessed it. i lost sight of the object when it went past the horizon towards philadelphia or the ocean
content.summary: Like an orb flying pass the earth extremley fast, lit up entire sky, saw out my window

content.detailedDescription:
5:40 est friday, dec. 18, 2009

dark heavy cloud cover. rain and sleet later in the day. 

i saw a bright (more than one light) just above the tree tops. i felt a little fright. i thought at first that it was a small plane going to crash, but almost right away i could tell how slow it was going and that its movement was level with the ground. i stopped my van and watched it very slowly move just over the houses. i could not hear a sound. then it stopped dead still. it looked funny, not like a plane... it must be a helicopter.. it was very still... just hovering over a house. a white light shined down like it was looking for something. i thought if i roll down my window i could tell if it was a helicopter. i knew even before the window was all the way down that it wasn't a helicopter, it had no blades... well , no tail at all. it looked flat on both sides and round in the middle when it was comming toward me, but from what i think was the side (it seemed to move in any direction) it looked like a rounded off triangle, fat near the middle and close to the frount.
as i rolled down my window it moved from a stand still directly around from me, it didn't turn, it just hovered straight across moving close to me. i didn't hear a thing as it moved over me a little and very close. i could see under it, it had two large yellow strips on teh underside. it stopped and started to rotate as if to turn what i thoguht as the front toward me. it made a swishing hydraulic sound as it did staying still except for turning. as it turned, it tillted up slightly. it may have been rotating to move... it moved what i thought was sidewaysstraight ahead very very slowly. it was a solid craft, no wings or propellers. two large red lights and a string of brilliantlu bright white small lights (around the sides). i'm not sure if the small lights moved or its rotating made it look like they where flashing around the craft. i watched it and it stopped over the retirement village and hovered. i couldn't hear the swishing noice as it moved away. my van was still running the whole few minutes. the area was on one of the gsp airports flight paths, gsp is only a few miles from teh retirement village. it was going in the direction of the airport but very low and slow.
i was so close i could see it looked metalic. it has indentations or seams on teh bottom, maybe for landig gear? or how it was put together... 
i don't know what it was but i see 747s, prop planes, every kind, landing at gsp 3 or 4 some hours; never saw anything like this! i've seen the small planes turn into the flight path and look like big white lightsmany times, but this thing stopped then came over to me and stopped again, hovered , rotated and made no sound until it rotated. then i'm sure no one in teh houses below it could hear it, even that swishing sound was very low. a plane or helicopter that was hovering would have blown out every window in these houses it came directly over 3 or 4 houses, no vibrations, no air movement.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo slowly moving and hovering close to the ground.

content.detailedDescription:

mikor csin���ltam egy k���pet, felt���nt egy mad���r, amelyik egyenesen berep���lt a napfelkelt���be, abba a vil���gos r���szbe. ism���t k���sz���tettem k���t k���pet, majd eltettem a f���nyk���pez���g���pet, ���s mentem a munk���m ut���n. csak t���bb h���t eltelt���vel, a film el���h���v���sa ut���n fedeztem fel ezt a furcsa r���szletet a k���pen. ut���lag teljesen megd���bbentem, mert akkor csak a mad���r ���s a napfelkelte l���tv���nya volt fontos.
sz���momra a kinagy���tott k���pen j���l l���tszik, hogy ez egy rep���l��� objektum. azonban olvasva az ufo jelens���ggel kapcsolatos szakirodalmat, ���n szkeptikus vagyok. engem nem gy���ztek meg a k���zz���tett felv���telek. hogy a k���pet nyilv���noss���gra hozom, egyetlen oka van: szeretn���k magam is magyar���zatot kapni."

t.Gy.
content.summary: Unusual object photographed in the sunrise! (hungarian description)

content.detailedDescription:
On january 13, 2010, at approximately 7:25 p.M., my 10 yr. old son and i were travelling se on kilby rd.In harrison/ cleves, ohio, when we  witnessed what appeared to be a flaming plane slowly descending on a 70-80 degree incline. we first noticed the object from a distance of 1-2 miles and it appeared that the trajectory of the object would result in an impact close to or on kilby. 

as we approached the object we noticed that it was no longer descending, but instead appeared to be hovering over a tilled field. the object appeared to consist of a square base that rose into a pyramidial/tri(quadrangular) shaped structure.  it was difficult to approximate the size, but it was larger than a moderately sized house.  

several passing cars braked and slowed to view the object, which appeared to be hovering 6-700 ft. off the deck.  upon closer observation, the object was not engulfed in flame, but projected white, gold and red flashing "shimmering" lights in what appeared to be a random pattern.  the lights were insufficient to cast a shadow on the deck and radiated in a more random strobelike pattern than a timed/sequential or cautionary flashes. i thought that the object may be a helicopter, but it did produce any sound at all.

i parked and exited my car approximately 1/4 mile from where the object hovered. i tried to establish a static line of sight with the tree line to determine whether the object was in fact hovering... (as it appeared).  as i observed the object, it did not appear to be travelling away from or deviate from it's hovering position..It hovered for less than 2-3 minutes before it slowly ascended and travelled in a ne arc, which ended in a se flight path.  we reentered the car and continued to drive se, when at the object reappeared briefly over the ridgeline several miles se of it's original position.  my son thought that the object instantly vanished, but i could not verify the observation as i was driving. we lost visual contact with the object when it disappeared over a ridgeline. 

a few minutes later we met a friend and explained what we observed.  she stated that one of her family friends claims to have witnessed a similar sighting 5-10 years ago in the approximate same location.  our friend agreed to have him contact me to discuss the incident and have a laugh...

i did not take any cell phone photos or videos, as it was too cold and my cell camera produces very low quality photos.  i considered contacting the local law enforcement agencies, but considering i am an attorney and have political/judicial aspirations, i did not think it wise.  

as an aside, my son and i maintain an interest in ufo's, watch all ufo programs and documentaries, which may predjudice the value of this observation. however, my son and i observed something odd, that did not appear to be an aircraft, did not emit sound and was not shaped like any aerodynamic aircraft we are familiar with. interesting, exciting and disturbing.  i would like to learn whether any of the other witnesses travelling northbound on kilby rd. reported similar sightings?  i know that several cars slowed to observe the craft.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Shimmering gold  white & red lights, appeared square with height almost a pyramid

content.detailedDescription: I was working on my grandparents avacado grove in rural de luz, california near camp pendleton. it was about 11:45am and my grandfather and i decided to eat lunch. so we were out on his porch facing an easterly direction, enjoying the weather when we both noticed a plane flying through a long dark streak that was almost a puplish color and was straight as an arrow going for miles. there were few clouds in the sky and and you could see this streak against the blue sky but it was cutting through one cloud like a knife. we noticed the airplane, which i believe was a comercial jet, flying through it so accurately that the aircraft's contrail was actually covering the streak up as it flew through it. the plane was flying through the streak for miles before it made an abrupt turn as if the pilot realized it was flying through something and was trying to get out of it and the plane disappeared behind a mountain. however i have seen many commercial aircraft flying over my house and my grandparents house and rarely do i see them make abrupt turns like that. i found it very odd. after the contrail had covered most of the streak there was little left to see and we decided to take a ride into neighboring fallbrook. i later returned home and explained what i saw to my family and they all agreed it was very strange and had no explanation for it either. after witnessing it i felt i saw something very unusual and maybe it was something i wasn't supposed to see. i was purplexed as was my grandfather. after recalling what i saw i have a few theories what it may have been but i am very unsure as to what it actually was. my first thought was it could have been a worm hole but why would it be cutting through a cloud? another theorie was that the streak could have been left by a ufo that may have taken off very quickly as i have heard of ufos punching holes through clouds but i have never heard of one leaving a dark streak that remained for a number of minutes. my third theory is that it was some sort of military experiment as my grandfathers house is just outside of camp pendleton and there are constantly a number of military aircraft flying over head but if this were the case, i could not even begin to explain what they are testing. it was by far the strangest thing i have ever seen and i can't explain what it could have been. unfortunately we got no photos of it as we were mesmerized by it and the camera on my phone is horrible and that is all i had.
content.summary: Long dark streak as far as the eye could see, cut through cloud. airplane flying through it

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 7:00 - it started when my mom was driving me home from the library. while we were on the road i noticed several large planes and a few smaller ones flying eastwards. i know they were planes because i could make out the outline of them and they had flashing red lights on them. my mom dropped me off at home with my brother, then she drove back to work. i noticed that there were still many planes flying overhead, so i decided to go into my front yard to watch. i felt kind of nervous while watching the planes, due to the fact that i've never seen this many in the air in this area, and because they were all flying east. i texted one of my friends about this and they said that around 900 troops were being flown overseas, which relieved me because i thought that maybe we were being invaded by another country. as i continued to watch, i noticed a an aircraft to the southeast that was hovering in the same place, occasionally moving in quick fluid circular motions. it was a bluish white color and looked like a pulsating fireball. i watched it for a few minutes, then called my mom over the phone to tell her about the object. after i put my cell phone away, i called my brother out to come look at it. he was fairly suprised but, because of the cold, he went back inside. afterwards, i noticed that these three orange orbs, that i previously thought were street lamps (they were stationary and fairly close to the ground), to the north of the blue object started moving slowly towards eachother. after they came close together, they quickened their speed and circled around eachother for about a second before they flew apart and formed a large triangle, which appeared to even have an outline. i stared at the object for around twwenty seconds before i ran back inside the house to find a video camera, and tell get my brother to come outside to watch with me. when we got back outside the triangle with the orange orb points was gone, but there was another solitary orb higher up in the sky. while i tried to figure out how to get the camera to work, we noticed another blue fireball a bit farther to the west from the first one, and at a slightly higher altitude. i gave up trying to work the camera, and looked up into the sky to try to spot the triangle again when we both noticed that there were actually several large triangles high up in the sky. the lights making the points of these triangles looked exactly like really bright stars, and there appereared to be much smaller and dimmer lights flying back and forth between the points. some of the triangles suddenly turned and then stopped to point in another direction. both me and my brother were getting scared so we went back inside. after a few minutes, i came back out by myself and looked up again and saw another star-like object with several other ones around it, and from the outer ones to the center one moved those very dim lights i saw moving in the triangles. these objects, like the others, seemed to be connected in a way to form a much larger object, but this one repeatedly changed it's shape by moving the outer lights around the center one. i stared at it until i started getting scared from all the triangles in the sky. i don't really remember much after i went back outside except for when i looked out the windows at around 11:00 and noticed almost all of the objects have gone, which made me feel safe enough to go to sleep. the only object remaining was one of the orange orb.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Several unidentified flying objects seen above glen allen.

content.detailedDescription:
No flash game camera, infered on location in woods behind the house.

a number events recorded over the last several months.

please note flash at 14 seconds on deer 223.  and we have no idea what was photographed on deer 232 but this was at 9:15 am and that was on 11-9-09

the last one was just an unusual flash then darkness.

would be greatful for any ideas.
content.summary: Unusal images captured by camera

content.detailedDescription:
This report was taken over the phone by dispatch, witness left a message on onebox voicemail, left message, dispatch called back to take report.
steve cox, mufon dispatch

date: 1-13-10
location: buckingham, pa bucks county, driving down route 413
40 degrees 19'25.03 minutes n, 75 degress 036'38.23 minutes w, elevation 264 ft

witness states he was driving down route 413 in buckingham, he saw a bright star in the sky, slowly desending, lost it behind the tree line, right after that he saw a bright orb object falling from sky it disappeared then it exploaded lighting up the whole sky like lightning. 

witness says it was thursday morning at 1:30 pm, i am questioning weather it was wed at 130 pm or thursday morning 1:30 am.
content.summary: Bright orb exploded, lite up entire sky

content.detailedDescription:
After dinner my husband noticed a light moving to the north along the eastern horizon, then stop dead in its tracks.  he called me over, and we watched from the kitchen window.  at first i thought it was a star or planet.  it was brighter than all the other stars in the sky, and seemed to be twinkling.  but then it started to move. at first it was in one spot, then seemed to rock back and forth.  i told him to go get his telescope, and he set up on the front porch.  meanwhile i kept an eye on the object.  it would move slightly, then back. once he was set up, i went out front.  he couldn't get the object in focus, but looking through the telescope you could see its lights were changing colors, like a rainbow disco light. it was moving slowly. you could tell it was moving because it was behind some tree limbs in the distance, and we used that as a point of reference. i was thinking, "holy crap, what the hell is that?"  i thought maybe it was a helicopter, but it was moving very strangely.  i got my telephoto camera out, but that didn't do any good either.  it was so cold out we decided to go in and watch through our bathroom window.  it was then that the object seemed to be moving back and forth, and upwards at the same time.  then it would go back down, side to side, etc. it was moving unlike anything i had seen in the sky before.  there were also three smaller lights below it that seemed to be moving in unison with it, but that part may have been my eyes playing tricks on me.  we were starting to get dizzy from watching it so intently, so we curled up in bed with a movie. after about a half an hour he went back to the window to go check on it and it was gone.  i felt like we should start preparing for our abduction.
please contact through email only
content.summary: Pulsating and hovering light moving erratically

content.detailedDescription:
I was staying at a relatives house, having had a restless night and great difficulty trying to sleep.

something disturbed a possum which jumped out of a tree and ran across the roof above me. i then heard what sounded like an unusual sonic hissing and crackling sound - i can't describe it exactly.
i looked out the window, and my attention was drawn towards a tall tree. behind the tree there was a rotating ring of light, just hovering, and not doing much else.

my heart has never pounded so fast in my life.
i was too frightened to get out of bed to have a closer look because i didn't want to draw any attention to myself and was too frightened to even want to fall asleep.
it made a hissing and crackling sound again, but it seemed more faint. 
this whole event went on until after dawn. i was i hoping the thing would go away and disappear when i heard a car drive up the street. but it was still there when i peeked out the window.
around 6am i finally went to sleep - for about two hours, and had a terrible day at work. the object was not there when i woke up.
content.summary: Rotating lights hovering for hours

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on i-65 south getting off at the keystone exit. i at first noticed 3 flashing aircrafts in the sky. my friend whom is in the air force, kept watching and exclaimed to me, "ralph, those aren't planes!". by that time, we were pulling into my apartment complex. i parked and watched closer. more and more flashing objects kept appearing in the sky. i spotted one closer to me and noticed it was shaped like a triangle. it moved at a very rapid pace north. i lost sight of all of them when i went into my apartment to go and get my digital camera. i was never a believer of ufos or anything like that until tonight. i was actually excited to be proved wrong. i am now a believer and will look out for more sightings.
content.summary: Flashing triangles over indianapolis sky

content.detailedDescription:
I live in a rural part of town & my house is kind of in the middle of no where.  in the past, i have seen silver lights that blink another red light, that look very similar to the traditional airplane. but sometimes i think that they are going way to slow to be a plane because they seem to be not moving at all. one time i even witnessed a solid ball of red light traveling  low to the ground at a high speed. these experiences all take place from me looking out of my huge half circle window on top of my other 4 regular square windows in my room, so i really have a good look at the sky. it is very dark at night & i can see plenty of stars.

my best friend & i were studying for our final examinations for college & in the past few years, i have enlightened him to the idea of ufo's being a part of reality.  i have watched every discovery channel show on ufo's & spend many hours on the internet researching ufo's.

between 6:50 & 7:30, my mother, sister, my good friend & i , all witnessed something truly once in a lifetime. i would sacrifice my left arm to go back in time & record the event with the most expensive hd camera money can buy. 

as my good friend & i walk back into my room after eating dinner, my friend says, "there are 2 of the blinkey things again." (he has seen them before at my house every now & then). as we watch them move from left to right, we see another coming from the same direction. it is easy to tell that they are moving because we can use the stars as points of reference. then we notice a couple more moving in the same direction, and all of the sudden we just keep seeing more & more coming. there were as many as 10 visible at once but they mostly came in groups of 3-5, 1 right after the other. i got my mom & sister so they could see why my friend & i were screaming "wtf!" at the top of our lungs. we witnessed 5 of them moving in 100% unison at 1 point were they were not blinking red, but looked like silver balls of light. they looked to be very far away & when i looked at them through the binoculars, it looked as if the red blink was traveling across the edge of the object & changing color as it dispersed around the craft. the red blink looked as if it would go through the entire color spectrum as it made its was to the but end of the craft, then it would blink again & again.

we all stayed glued to the window as they just kept coming from right to left. we saw at least 50-60 within the time frame of watching them. in the middle of the time frame, i grabbed my deer spotlight that is very strong & went outside in the freezing cold to watch them.  they all went at the same speed & went from left to right until they were too faint to see. once outside with my friend, i randomly pointed at 1 of them to the far right, that was moving to the right. my friend then says, "i think that 1 turned around...". i kept the light pointed in it's direction & it indeed look as if it was getting closer. ***it continued to come towards us & i kept the light on it, it was still high up but it was much lower than any of them. there was a 2 second time frame where i had a perfect view of the bottom of it as i was directly underneath it...This is when the both of us said "it's a triangle!!!" at the same time. it flew directly over us and we watched it until it was out of sight.  this triangle shape was only visible with the help of the spotlight, but it was not close enough to actually hit it with the light but it illuminated the area underneath it & for an instant you could see a dark equilateral triangle with 3 white round lights equally spaced apart on the underside. it was a very distinct sight when it was right over top of us & it did not make a single sound, nor did we hear any other sounds coming from aircrafts. latrobe airport is about 7 minutes from my house & i know what a plane sounds like coming in & going out of the airport. the airport is very small and not that active to where i could think that maybe i was just looking at planes. there were just too many in such a small time frame. i know what planes look like in the sky but i will say that these all looked very similar to planes from afar but they definitely were not. there were too many of them flying too close to each other to be planes. i have lived here all my life. also, my mother was very scared.

after the very low ufo was out of site, we went back inside because it was very cold, but we went straight back to the window. i then made a phone call to my friend who lives in greensburg, (very close to latrobe) who dose not believe in ufo's. he answered & i told him to look out his window & to look for blinky lights in the sky. the moment he got to his window he said "yeah i see 2." his next remark was "they are flying close to each other." this person still dose not believe in ufo's & did not believe much of my story which i told him the next day in school, but i believe he was seeing some of the ones that have already surpassed my point of view. i did this while still watching them from my window in my room.

not to make my story sound any more unbelievable, but the next night, at the same time, it all started again. they came from left to right & once again i watched them the entire time & saw 50-60 individuals total again! this 2nd event was only witnessed by my sister & i this time. i also called a neighbor who lives up the road from me on a big hill & he instantly noticed them too. final exams were next week and i had so much studying to do, but i just could not pull myself from the window because i kept on spotting them. each time 1 would go out of sight, i would notice 2 more to the far left & some of them looked as if they were stationary.

i emailed stan gordon the night of the 1st event but he never responded. i have been thinking about the event a lot because someone else must have witnessed this occurring & it bothers me that this was not on national news.  

i am 19 years old & i am currently a sophomore at saint vincent college,  majoring in environmental science.
content.summary: Numerous ufo's spoted, most traveling in same direction, spotted 5 traveling in sync

content.detailedDescription: I live 8 miles outside the closest town, and it's dark and quiet out here. i also smoke outside the house when i smoke.This night, i walked out front about 10:00-11:00 pm to smoke.And as usual, i was looking at the stars and sky, whe i noticed 6-lights in a formation moving across the sky from east to west.The thing that caught my attention was that there were no flashing lights or sound. all aircraft have flashing lifhts and sound from the engine. but, this had none.The formation remained the same as it moved across the sky.The light's were bright but didnt seem to be emitting any beam, they just seemed to be lights like a star, with no direction.I did not see any craft because of the darkness, but the lights were  very bright. iv'e seen alot of comercial aircraft go across the sky , and knowing how high and how fast the fly, i would judge the speed of this at 3-4 times the speed of a comercial craft ,if it was flying at the same height as one 300-350 mph at 30,000-35,000 ft. but as i stated,,it made   no   sound     which i cvan here jet wash from jets a great distance away.  if  this was flying at a height that was too high to hear it   then  the speed would be considerably greater than that of anything i have ever heard of flying today..I have watched satilites fry across the sky just after sunset when the sun still shines on them and they look almost like a star moving  very fast  across the sky. and would estimate the speed of this to be close to the speed of a satilite. it resembled to triangles with 1 point facing west and 1 point facing east. t i dont have a lot of computer exprience, so i will show you best that i can..As i said  i saw 6 lights so you will have to imagine the shape of this without the lines    just lights at the points   <  >   at first i thought it might be 6 military jets flying in formation and the sound would follow shortly behind as mant times the craft outflys the sound, but no sound ever came and the speed was very fast,copared to a commecial airliner. as i said, they had no flashing lights as all aircraft does and if they were far enough away to not hear, then the speed would have been rediculus fast.
content.summary: object moving across sky from east to west with no sound or flashing lights like seen on aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: It started as i noticed lights that appeared each night. i know now that they are not conventional aircraft. with the naked eye you can see that they are multicolored. with a camera you can see the brilliant display of colrs. these things are too high upto be a hoax. the website that tracks the spacestation says the iss is over the pacific when i have seen these lights. on 1 photograph you can see a triangle shape. i dont know if its just a star group. i dont know what these things are. we would like to know. if any investigator wants to see a ufo in action this is your chance. either its not from this world or many sightings will be explained but someone with the right equipment needs to investigate. i am looking at the lights right now. they appear every night so far.
content.summary: Unexplained lights.

content.detailedDescription:
1. at my house in my driveway starting my car to let it warm up.
2. was looking up admiring the stars and sky as i always do.
3. a white sphere dropping in altitude quickly and in my direction.
4. white sphere traveled from high altitude down to an extremely low altitude very quickly from west to east in my direction...When it reached a very low altitude it curved its flightpath as if knowing i was watching it and very slowly flew in a northerly direction as if following the street in front of my house so i could watch it....At this time the object was obviously a disc shape of some sort with 2 plasma-ish looking circles radiating an orangish light at the front bottom of the craft. also what looked like an electric type shield was radiating from the leading edge of the craft changing in colors from orangish to bright white...As if this ship was decloaking or something. 
5. i was very ecstatic to see this and kept wondering how to convey this sighting in a manner for everyone to understand. as we all deserve the truth.
6. lost sight of the object when it went behind the hills and treetops. although had perfect visibilty for the duration of the sighting.
content.summary: Disc slowly traveling following main street through rutland, oh

content.detailedDescription: I was driving looked up seen 3 circles  i tired to call m dad to look out and see them i was only a mile from home he didnt answer so i got my phone out to take a picture and my gf said they will see you right then 2 went away only the middle one was left it remained there for 10 seconds then it was gone.  i was driving west they were orange large in size cant tell how far away they were or how high
content.summary: In a straight line 3 circles

content.detailedDescription:
This happened in the city of brisbane (population about 1.2 million) at the end of 1989. i was just finished a sports training session on an outdoor athletics track in toowong, a highly populated and developed inner suburb of brisbane. at the end of my training session i lay on the grass field on my back, stretching my legs and back and arms in the way i always had for almost a decade. it was already dark but there was sufficient light from nearby street lights for me to continue warming down and stretching on the grass before going home. 
as i lay on my back on the grass i looked up at the sky and saw it was completely black. it looked a little odd not to see anything at all, no stars, no clouds. just black. then i looked further toward the east, and noticed that there were stars in that direction. then i actually saw stars, first one or two, then several, then more and more, blinking to life in an organised way. like, blinking to life in turn. and then i realised that something huge and black was floating across the sky and was blotting out a very large slice of it. then i began to see the shape of this enormous black object, it was easily several times longer than the sports field, and three or four times wider. i saw that it had its own lights that were just about the same brightness of bright stars along its two leading edges. i didn't count how many of these lights there were but would guess 9 or 10, maybe more. as the object flew/floated overhead, heading west, it blotted out other stars immediately in front of it and they blinked out, just as the stars to the east were blinking on when the craft's end passed. 
it was an extraordinary couple of minutes. it may only have been one minute, but it seemed like it went on for a very long time. i was shocked by several things. 1) that it was so absolutely enormous. it was like watching a battleship, or a mountain, float in the sky. 2) that it was absolutely silent. 3) that it did not suddenly fly off as soon as i had seen it. 4) that it was flying across a major population area, a major city. from it's line of travel it must have flown straight over the top of the observatory at toowong, and also the university of queensland. 5) that traffic did not come to a screetching halt 6) that i myself, in spite of seeing something that crashed against my ideas of reality and everyone's ideas of physics, just simply was so casual about it. i didn't tell anyone. all my thoughts about what i had seen became sort of anaesthetised in a sense. 7) then as i watched it "float" silently overhead, as if to accentuate the fact that it was real, and was a single object, it slowly rolled over in the sky as it flew. it looked like it rolled, but it might also have been folding its leading edges toward its spine. it was so matt black i couldn't make out any detail other than its triangle shape. and i could only see its shape, really, by the acres of stars that it was blotting out above it. 
i would guess it was travelling at a height of about 1500 feet to maybe 2500 feet. it felt close. 
oh... and i can't remember how i lost sight of it. that is point number 8.
content.summary: Gigantic black triangular craft, silent, 2000 feet overhead, hundreds of metres long and wide

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling west on walnut grove, i noticed a large object descending behind the tree line near east highschool. it was still daylight, the sun was going down. the object was easily larger than east highschool's football field, it was rotating and disc-like in nature. the object was clearly divided into two distinct sections, a smaller top 'half' sitting atop a larger bottom 'half'. the sections appeared to rotate opposite of each other (ie, one clockwise and the other counterclockwise) in "half rotations"...They would rotate halfway in one direction and then rotate halfway in the other direction, independently of each other in a smooth, consistent movement. this 'rotation' was evidenced by three sections of pulsing lights (top, mid section, and bottom) and may have simply been the sequence of the lights and not actually any structural rotation.

the lights were pulsing and very large. the lights were yellow, red, green, and blue with yellow probably as the most prominent. as we drove down walnut grove, approximately 100 to 200 feet, we passed the tree line and the object was no longer visible on the other side.

others were in the car with me. i have read and heard about other observations in memphis around the same time frame. i believe that the object i saw, the object described in your report, and an object famously observed by officer lamar todd of the memphis police department along i-240 and norris (which would be in the same general area as the report on your site, near the downtown interstate and mississippi bridge) may all possibly be the same object.


if more details are needed, feel free to e-mail me.
content.summary: Confirmation of 'mothership sighting' reported on february 14th, 1976

content.detailedDescription: A mcallen, texas family residing near the intersection of north main street and kendlewood avenue reports having recurring ufo sightings in the backyard of their home. objects seen are described as metallic spheres, often observed shining light beams down to the ground below. three family members (mother, son, and uncle) state that these spheres often move from very high up in the atmosphere down to several hundred feet of where the observers are standing on the ground. there are sometimes 3 or 4 of these spheres present at the same time. two of the family members (uncle and son) have shone flashlights and  an astronomical green laser pointer at the spheres, and it is their opinion that the spheres have responded by shining their own beams back at them and by swooping down as if to take a closer look at the humans. the son expresses fears about continuing to signal the objects and states that he is concerned about what the objects might do to his family as a result of the signalling.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Recurring sightings of metallic spheres since june 2009.

content.detailedDescription:
1. approx. june 20, 1994- leaving work at 4:00pm and was in the ihop parking lot, preparing to drive home.  looked up and saw something shocking. 
2. saw dark disc above trees.
3.& 4. disc shaped object, hovering above a small forested area across the interstate highway.  object was 'wobbling' as it hovered.  one second it would seem to disappear, then as it wobbled a different direction, it would become visible until it rotated, becoming "cloaked like the ships in star trek".  therefore, one second it was visible, then the next it was not.

object was approximately 60 feet in diameter, 6 feet top to bottom.  appeared black except when it took on another angle, then it 'disappeared' (reflected it's surroundings).  
elevation: 80 to 100 feet, hovering.
distance: 800 to 1,000 feet.

5.& 6. transfixed, somewhat scared, watching the object until it vanished and did not reappear. observed approximately 1 to 2 minutes.  don't know if the object just stopped moving, or if it took off at 'light speed'.
content.summary: While preparing to leave work, saw "cloaked" disc over woods.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night (1-12-10) we saw amber-colored lights fade into view and then fade out at around 7:15 pm. they were due north of our location, above and a little to the left of a radio tower. very brief sighting, but 3 in a row and then two together. no sound, no running lights and no movement.

we've had a previous similar sighting and are working with a mufon investigator on this one (john fegel, 9302).
content.summary: Lights

content.detailedDescription: Around 6:30 pm on 01-12-2009, i could see two fireballs that looked to be connected by a line of fire. the object was always at an angle. i was driving in my car, thinking i would get closer and see what this was. i thought it was something on fire or some weird flares. sometimes the object would completely disappear. when i finally got to a clearing in the road i did not see anything. when i got closer to my home i could see the two balls of light off and on. they would just dissappear. it would hover over the lake of the ozarks. one ball dropped in the woods like a falling star. i called my husband then very concerned. i got out of my car to see better and i could go no further on the snow packed road with my car. i saw three lights connected at one point. i had my husband walk up our drive to where i was at. he shined a flash light and the lights in the sky dissapeared completely. we walked back home, even though i wanted to stay and get a picture. when we got home, i showed him two bright lights that looked like stars hovering over a cove. we could see them from our deck overlooking the lake. he said they were stealth planes. they flared up and took off, they then returned and when i shined a flash light at them they completely dissappeared. can stealths turn off their lights like that? these last objects were completely different than what i had seen earlier. the later were farther away in the sky, the first objects that looked like fireballs were close by over the woods and over the lake.
content.summary: Two connected fireballs hovering low in sky through woods

content.detailedDescription: It was a clear crisp night so my friend and i went out to take pictures of the night sky. i was looking at the little dipper in the southern portion of the sky when i noticed a white flash just below the handle. i took seven pictures with a fujifilm 10 megapixel digital camera while resting my arm on the roof of the car without using the zoom or flash features.
content.summary: Flashing light noted in view finder of camera

content.detailedDescription:
It was at night and my husband wanted to get more beer and he was already drunk and he could not drive so i said i would take him up as i don't drink and i could drive.  i was mad at him and we was going up our drive way and i stopped as i saw the fire truck of the guy that lives across the street and i saw his red and blue light and was thinking fire or a car accident then just above his truck i saw these real big bright lights (it was almost like seeing football stadium like lights) and my mind could not wrap around it as it was to low and going the wrong direction and was way to slow. and i kept thinking what is wrong with this.  and i kept thinking this is not  right.  and i kept thinking what is that and i tried to get my husband to look and he was so drunk he did not see it.  it looked like it was just sort of floating slow and it was right over the houses like right there i looked at my dash board on my truck and the radio still worked so nothing happen to them and as it got to my side of the truck i rolled down my window and i was thinking what flies in the shape of a triangle and i kept looking and i could see it front to back and side to side and under it to the top and i was thinking no frame no engine noise no wings and no propeller and then i knew what it was it was a ufo and it was right there at about 11 at night and it just kept going real slow and as it got passed i was still looking at it and i still could see the the front and sides and as i looked at the back it was dark but i could see nothing and i also noticed it was following the power line and my husband said lets go or the store will be closed. we have two bases not to far from our house, one is call ft.Richardson and it is at anchorage.  that one is the air force base and the other base is the army base.  that one is called ft. elemendorf  just out of anchorage. i think this ufo was so low that no one could see it on radar. i have lived by two different air ports and and i have been to air show and i have seen and heard jets as they fly to the side of our house and also army helicopters that fly over our house and i have seen the stealth bomber and also the concord and the jets at the airport and we have float planes that fly around.
i've also seen a parachute glider and a parachute glider with an engine that you sit in. and also twin turbo prop plane so i really know what i saw.  i did not tell anyone because i did not know who to tell and as i guess i was the only one to see it.  i told my mom and and she believes me and i told my friend and she believes me. i also told the guy i was working for, who was an airplane pilot at the time, but he didn't believe me because he doesn't believe in ufos. the only other person i've told of this was my son and he doesn't believe me. i don't care who believes me or doesn't, i know what i saw and i hope this helps you guys out at least a little. it was right there and i saw it, no mistakes.
i didn't want to think anyone to think i was crazy so i kept it to myself until i saw mufon on the history channel on 01/13/2010. i tend to watch all the ufo oritented shows anyways before and after my experience. 
this is all true as far as i remember.
content.summary: Triangle shaped, three lights in the back, two lights in the center, one in the front, looked like bright stadium like lights

content.detailedDescription:
I filmed this ufo .It wasn't blimp nor balloon   

link:  http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=mffjnhywubi
content.summary: Spining top like oject
